review: 볼링치러 다녀왔는데 재밌었어요 양궁도 있고 볼링장도 커서 놀기 좋더라구요. 골프 연습장도 있구요. 지인분들과 식사하고 운동할 겸 갔었는데 쾌적하고 좋았어요. 아메리카노 주문해서 마셨는데 커피 맛도 의외로 맛있었어요.
review_en: I went bowling and it was fun. Archery and bowling alley are big so it's good to play. There's also a golf course. I went there to eat and exercise with my friends, and it was pleasant and nice. I ordered Americano and the coffee tasted surprisingly good.

review: 오래된 느낌의 스포츠센터 어린 시절부터 있던 동네 스프츠센터에요. 볼링장은 오래되긴 했으나 관리가 잘 되어있고 수영장도 있어요. 골프연습장도 있어 다양한 스포츠를 하기에 좋은 장소입니다.
review_en: It's an old-fashioned sports center. It's a local sputz center that's been around since childhood. The bowling alley is old, but it is well managed and has a swimming pool. There is also a driving range for golf, so it is a good place to play various sports.
